name: mcintosh
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a sweet apple with red skin from Canada: For best results, use an apple that breaks down easily during cooking, such as McIntosh. She chooses Golden Delicious apples over McIntoshes.
More examplesFewer examplesThey grow 50 varieties of apples, including McIntosh, Red Delicious, and Spartan. I can remember many family hikes fuelled by freshly picked McIntosh apples and thick slices of cheddar cheese with bread.Go to any farmer's market at this time of year and you'll see piles of Braeburns, McIntoshes, and Macouns.
